portfolio.title: QuickChat
portfolio.description: Created a TCP client-server chat application that utilities asynchronous I/O to handle multiple concurrent connections. Practiced Resource Acquisition Is Initialization through the management of sockets.

portfolio.title: Sudoku
portfolio.description: Built a cross-platform Sudoku game with an intuitive UI that highlights row, column and box violations to increase solve speed. Implemented fast puzzle generating and solving algorithms using backtracking and bitwise validation.

portfolio.title: Mazer
portfolio.description: Developed a real-time 3D raycasting engine in C++ rendered in the console with player movement and collision detection. Interfaced with an open-source console window game engine, improving the modularity and extensibility.
